ygData.subject: Phew!
ygData.msgSnippet: I had the scare of my life! Errr... maybe not that drastic.... I was fishing in North Qeynos over by Crow s when I fell in and forgot how to swim. Before I
ygData.messageBody:
I had the scare of my life! Errr... maybe not
that drastic....<br>I was fishing in North Qeynos over
by Crow's when I fell in and forgot how to swim.
Before I could drown, I shut off my puter. I thought I
had drowned and was cursing myself on having to start
from Surefall Glades with no armor or weapons or my
beloved brew. But when I played the game yesterday, I
started out with a full bar of air in the bottom of the
pond! I had read the book guide after I had shut down
the puter yesterday, and so I know knew how to swim.
I swam to top and got out! :) :) :) The only
problems I had to face after that was that I had no drink,
and the stupid thing was lagging. So I'm in Sneed's
right now TRYING to make a purchase.
